availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Nancy Allen McKinney Bibb in Green County, Kentucky, on November 11, 1832. Father of Sarilda Bibb, Frances Bibb, Irene T. Bibb, James R. Bibb, and Laura E. Bibb. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons, including Mariah Bibb, in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 125A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 635.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 63B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 3, p. 456A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Green County Marriages, Film 000595013.
